item.title: About
item.description: A constant learner. More Information I’m doing tech things for a living. Currently as a System Engineer @gojek. AWS, Kubernetes, Python+Go, and Cloud Native technologies are my fields.

item.title: Carbon Footprint
item.description: The recently famous young environmental activist, Greta Thunberg, has been campainging about reducing carbon footprints. She made headlines in the internet when taking train back home and sail boat accross the Atlantic instead of planes.

item.title: kubectl
item.description: This is a living document specially crafted for my personal use Go to cheatsheet About kubectl Mental scratchpad: It is the CLI tool to interact with Kubernetes API server (apiserver).

item.title: Life
item.description: What’s life? Combinations of natural atoms and molecules that somehow interact each other to form a set of functions to sustain themselves/keep themselves in the environment as long as possible.
